title: go.tools/imports: update playground with fixed version
body:
1. Go to play.golang.org
2. Replace the import line with a comment
3. Click "Format".  Notice that the comment stays where it is.
4. Check "Imports" and click "Format" again.  The comment is moved
after main().

What is the expected output?
goimports leaves the comment above main().

What do you see instead?
goimports moves the comment after main().

In a real program, the comment rearranging can be much worse:
http://play.golang.org/p/Wvy-jYoctS  (taken from https://github.com/dgryski/dkrcrypt )

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version go1.2 linux/amd64.  This happens with goimports pulled from go.tools too, not
only the playground version.
